item.title: UAS Raichur celebrates 17th Foundation Day
item.description:
<![CDATA[Srinivasalu, Principal Secretary, Department of Ecology and Environment, Karnataka, inaugurated the 17th Foundation Day celebrations of the University of Agriculture Sciences (UAS) Raichur on Saturday.
Dr. Srinivasalu reserved most of his time during the speech to motivate students and said that students should adopt discipline and continue with dedication to beat challenges and difficult situations to achieve in the field chosen. â€œThe challenges that you face may bring changes. You must use su...]]>
